unnormalised: IPL 2024 is just around the corner, folks! I can already smell the biryani and hear the cheers. This year's schedule promises to be a cracker, with matches happening all over India. Get your calendars ready because you won't want to miss a single six!
normalised: I-P-L two thousand and twenty four is just around the corner, folks! I can already smell the biryani and hear the cheers. This year's schedule promises to be a cracker, with matches happening all over India. Get your calendars ready because you won't want to miss a single six!

unnormalised: The opening match is set for 22/03/2024. Chennai Super Kings, the defending champions, will be facing off against Royal Challengers Bangalore. Expect fireworks from ball one! The game starts at 7:30 PM IST, so make sure you’ve wrapped up your office work and are ready to settle in.
normalised: The opening match is set for twenty second march two thousand and twenty four. Chennai Super Kings, the defending champions, will be facing off against Royal Challengers Bangalore. Expect fireworks from ball one! The game starts at seven thirty P-M I-S-T, so make sure you’ve wrapped up your office work and are ready to settle in.

unnormalised: We’ve got double-headers galore this season too! Keep an eye out for those Sunday afternoon games. The first one is on 31/03/2024, with two matches scheduled back-to-back. 3:30 PM for the first, and 7:30 PM for the second. Talk about a super Sunday!
normalised: We’ve got double-headers galore this season too! Keep an eye out for those Sunday afternoon games. The first one is on thirty first march two thousand and twenty four, with two matches scheduled back-to-back. Three thirty P-M for the first, and seven thirty P-M for the second. Talk about a super Sunday!

unnormalised: For those of you planning to attend matches in person, tickets go on sale from 01/03/2024. Book early, especially if you want to catch the Chennai matches at Chepauk or the Kolkata games at Eden Gardens. Trust me, those tickets disappear faster than free samosas at a wedding.
normalised: For those of you planning to attend matches in person, tickets go on sale from first march two thousand and twenty four. Book early, especially if you want to catch the Chennai matches at Chepauk or the Kolkata games at Eden Gardens. Trust me, those tickets disappear faster than free samosas at a wedding.

unnormalised: The playoffs are scheduled to start on 21/05/2024, and the final is on 26/05/2024. Mark your calendars, prepone any important commitments, and get ready for some nail-biting action! Who do you think will lift the trophy this year? CSK again, or will we see a new champion?
normalised: The playoffs are scheduled to start on twenty first may two thousand and twenty four, and the final is on twenty sixth may two thousand and twenty four. Mark your calendars, prepone any important commitments, and get ready for some nail-biting action! Who do you think will lift the trophy this year? C-S-K again, or will we see a new champion?

unnormalised: So, there you have it – a quick rundown of the IPL 2024 schedule. Don't forget to set reminders for your favourite teams’ games. Let the games begin! Also, the Women's T20 World Cup Final is on 08/03/2024 - another date for your diaries!
normalised: So, there you have it – a quick rundown of the I-P-L two thousand and twenty four schedule. Don't forget to set reminders for your favourite teams’ games. Let the games begin! Also, the Women's T-twenty World Cup Final is on eighth march two thousand and twenty four - another date for your diaries!
